item.description:
Any excuse for a party!

We've had a change of plans & will not be having this event @ Bokx 109.
Instead we'll be using the communal lounge area at my building, the JamaicaWay Tower and Townhouses, and having a Pot-Luck/BYO get-together.

Happy Hour (bubbly!) from 7-8pm and dessert at the end of the evening will be provided (and covered by the reduced event fee of $5).

And instead of spending oodles of boodle on restaurant food, all you need to do is bring your favorite appetizer or dinner dish. Please choose one of the following and include your selection as your RSVP comment. Note that the items in dark blue have already been selected by others, items in pink remain unselected:

1. Veggie tray with dip
2. Hummus and Pita for dipping
3. Salsa and tortilla chips
4. Large pizza with Meat
5. Large pizza with Meat
6. Large Meatless pizza
7. Main Dish with Meat 1 - enough for 6 people
8. Main Dish with Meat 2 - enough for 6 people
9. Main Dish with Meat 3 - enough for 6 people
10. Main Dish with Meat 4 - enough for 6 people
11. Main Dish Vegan/Vegetarian - enough for 6 people
12. Garden salad and dressing - enough for 12 people
13. Hot side dish 1 - enough for 6 people
14. Hot side 2 - enough for 6 people
15. Hot side 3 - enough for 6 people
16. Fruit plate - enough for 6 people
17. Soft Drinks - enough for 12 people

[A bunch of people are already signed up to bring beer and a variety of wines - so all you need to do is bring one food item or soda's. No "drinks/cocktails" necessary - but if you bring them we won't turn them down... ]

And even though it is my birthday, please no presents / gifts - just bring your presence and attend the event - it is going to be fun!
And if you'd like to bring a couple of friends with you (tall or short, this bash is for all), that's cool.
Just include them in your RSVP (+1 or 2) and pay for them when you pay for your ticket.

So.... all of y'all that have been lurking in the shadows and never seem to make it to an event...
Come Out & Play on June 13th!!!
item.how_to_find_us: The reception desk will show you where the mezzanine level lounge is
item.name: Bubbly Birthday Bash in JP
